summary: The 'Veterans Education and Technical Skills Opportunity Act of 2025' amends Title 38 of the United States Code to modify the criteria for approving independent study programs for veterans' educational assistance. It specifically adjusts requirements for institutions of higher education offering these programs, including those participating in student financial assistance programs outlined in Title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965. The amendments apply to terms beginning on or after August 1, 2025.
